questions.question: You are a student with a B1 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 80 words. You attended an event. Write an article for your blog.

answers.answer: 2. Introduction: Last week, I had the pleasure of attending the annual charity gala event organised by our school. It was an unforgettable night filled with laughter, music, and a sense of unity.

3. Body: The event started with a welcome speech by our school principal, followed by a live auction and a charity raffle. The highlight of the night was the live performance by the renowned band, "The Beats". Their energetic performance had everyone on their feet, dancing and singing along.

4. Conclusion: The event was a huge success, raising a significant amount for a good cause. I am grateful for the opportunity to have been a part of such a meaningful event. I look forward to attending next year's gala.
5. Sign-off: Until next time, keep spreading kindness!
